name: Super Space Caveman
description:
Fly through space as a caveman and use your rocks to destroy alien ships. Use the W and S keys to move your ship up and down. Press and hold the left mouse button to shoot out rocks that will destroy the alien ships.  

This is a very short game that was created in 3 days for Odd Weekend Game Jam #20. Check out some of the other cool games at the link below. 

https://oddweekendgamejam.com/
